mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_article(r_id, r_long_title, r_subheading, r_author, r_summary, r_content, create_time, last_edit_time, r_publish, r_status) VALUE (#{rId}, #{rLongTitle}, #{rSubheading}, #{rAuthor}, #{rSummary}, #{rContent}, #{createTime}, #{lastEditTime}, #{rPublish}, #{rStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT id, r_id, r_long_title, r_subheading, r_author, r_summary, r_content, create_time, last_edit_time, r_publish, r_status FROM tb_article WHERE r_status='0' ORDER BY last_edit_time DESC
SELECT id, r_id, r_long_title, r_subheading, r_author, r_summary, r_content, create_time, last_edit_time, r_publish, r_status FROM tb_article WHERE r_id = #{rid}
